title: invoke
name: invoke
description:
Invokes component methods from within a page or component.
			You use this tag to reference a WSDL file and consume a web service from within a block of CFML code.

attributes.name: component
attributes.description:
String or component object; a reference to a component, or
            component to instantiate.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description:
Name of a method. For a web service, the name of an
            operation.

attributes.name: returnvariable
attributes.description: Name of a variable for the invocation result.

attributes.name: username
attributes.description: Overrides username specified in Administrator > Web Services

attributes.name: password
attributes.description: Overrides password specified in Administrator > Web Services

attributes.name: webservice
attributes.description: The URL of the WSDL file for the web service.

attributes.name: timeout
attributes.description: The timeout for the web service request, in seconds

attributes.name: proxyserver
attributes.description: The proxy server required to access the webservice URL.

attributes.name: proxyport
attributes.description: The port to use on The proxy server.

attributes.name: proxyuser
attributes.description: The user ID to send to the proxy server.

attributes.name: proxypassword
attributes.description: The user's password on the proxy server.

attributes.name: serviceport
attributes.description:
The port name for the web service. This value is
            case-sensitive and corresponds to the port element's
            name attribute under the service element. Specify this
            attribute if the web service contains multiple ports.
            Default: first port found in the WSDL.
